definitions.definition: When children are naughty, or their behaviour is naughty, they behave badly or do not do what they are told to do:
examples: Now that's naughty - don't throw food on the floor!

definitions.definition: used slightly humorously to describe an adult who has behaved badly or an adult's bad action:
examples: "I'm afraid I borrowed your car without asking." "Yes, that was very naughty of you - I needed it at the weekend!"
